shortdesc.ph: Deletes the least recently used cached media file in the media player.
Deletes the least recently used cached media file in the media player.
Deletes the least recently used cached media file in the media player.
Deletes the least recently used cached media file in the media player.

section.p: When cached media files occupy too much space, you can call this method to clean up the cache. After calling this method, the SDK deletes the least recently used cached media file.
When cached media files occupy too much space, you can call this method to clean up cache files. After calling this method, the SDK deletes the least recently used cached media file.
When cached media files occupy too much space, you can call this method to clean up cache files. After calling this method, the SDK deletes the least recently used cached media file.
When cached media files occupy too much space, you can call this method to clean up cache files. After calling this method, the SDK deletes the least recently used cached media file.
section.note: When you call this method to delete a cached media file, the currently playing cached media file will not be deleted.
When you call this method to delete cached media files, cached media files that are currently playing will not be deleted.
When you call this method to delete cached media files, the currently playing cached media file will not be deleted.
When you call this method to delete cached media files, the currently playing cached media file will not be deleted.

section.title: Return Values
section.p:
When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown. You need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly. See [Error Codes](https://docs.agora.io/en/video-calling/troubleshooting/error-codes) for details and resolution suggestions.
< 0: Failure. See .
